resources.string: Visit att.com, and confirm that your plan includes Visual Voicemail.
We tried to set up your account, but we couldn\'t.
Check that you’re connected to the AT&T data network.
Visit att.com to confirm that your data plan includes AT&T Visual Voicemail.
We didn\'t receive the notification required to continue your AT&T Visual Voicemail setup.
Save time. Review and manage your voicemail from your smartphone with AT&T Visual Voicemail.
To set up Visual Voicemail, tap Begin Setup.
To set up Visual Voicemail tap Call Voicemail.
Read text copies of your messages
1. Double-check that you’re connected to the AT&T data network.
2. Tap Call Again below to call your voicemail; ensure that you enter your mailbox before you hang up.
3. Visit att.com or call 611 to confirm that your data plan includes Visual Voicemail.
4. Return here, tap Call again, and continue setup.
4. Return here, tap Call Voicemail, and continue setup.
4. Return here, tap Try Again, and continue setup.
The notification still hasn’t been received, but you can still set up Visual Voicemail.
Use the button below to call your voicemail.Then follow the prompts to set up your Visual Voicemail account.
A notification required for setup hasn’t been received.
An account verification has not been received yet, press the Call Again button below
Your app has been successfully setup. Tap Finish below to view your messages.
From the app settings menu you can change your voicemail greeting, change your password and turn on transcription to text capabilities.

string.name: EULA
string.a: AT&T Visual Voicemail Terms of Service

resources.string: Forgot password? Call 611 to reset it.
Share your personalized voicemail greeting with callers
Share your mobile number with callers

Oops… 

Looks like there’s a problem with your mailbox, or you’re on a plan that doesn’t include Visual Voicemail. Please visit att.com to change your data plan to one with VVM.

As a reminder, VVM is a free application and receiving voicemail doesn’t count against your data plan while on the AT&T network.

To complete your Visual Voicemail setup, please call voicemail using the button below. Follow the prompts to establish or enter your voicemail password. After completing, press ‘End call’ to continue setup.
To complete setup, please call voicemail using the button below and enter your voicemail password if prompted. \nNote: No need to check your messages. Just end the call and the setup will continue.
Your AT&T device comes powered with AT&T Visual Voicemail.
*To use Visual Voicemail, you must allow the app to access your phone and messages.
Visual Voicemail is a service that delivers voicemail messages right to your smartphone. No more having to call your mailbox to listen to them.
View a list of your voicemail messages
Play them in any order you choose
Forward messages via email or MMS
Save messages to your device memory or the memory card
An account verification has not been received yet, press the Call Voicemail button below
You\'re nearly done. Tap \"Activate Visual Voicemail\" below to set up your new service.
You\'re nearly done. Tap \"Call Voicemail\" below to set up your new service.
An account verification has not been received yet, press the Try again button below
This action cannot be completed at this time
Congrats! You\'ve successfully installed AT&T Messages. Now you can view all your visual voicemails, messages and call logs from one app.
Note: AT&T Visual Voicemail and AT&T Messages can\'t be used simultaneously. If you miss AT&T Visual Voicemail, uninstall AT&T Messages and reinstall AT&T Visual Voicemail.
Auto-save saves new messages as they arrive. To save already existing voicemail, select \'Save\' in the menu when viewing the specific message.
By clicking Activate Visual Voicemail,\n you agree to the AT&T Visual Voicemail
Unable to download messages. Try later or call Voicemail for new messages.
Type in your new voicemail password
Type in a new voicemail password
%1$s won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device.
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device.
%1$s won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.
%1$s won\'t run without Google Play services, which are currently updating.
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
could not locate the subscriber profile
Would you like to record a new custom greeting or use your existing one?
The selected messages will be deleted
You have denied permission for this action.\nYou can change permissions in\n Settings > Apps > Visual Voicemail > Permissions
The message has been exported to:
You can change permissions in\n Settings > Apps > Visual Voicemail > Permissions
To use Visual Voicemail, you must allow the app to access your Phone, Messages and Contacts
We couldn\'t get the information we need to set up your greeting right now.
Finish setting up your Visual Voicemail, then visit Setings > Greetings to record your greeting.
Looks like we couldn\'t get the greeting information we needed at the moment\n\n You can still finish setup greeting from settings
Your greeting message was successfully updated.
Your greeting message was not updated. Please try again later.
Looks like something\'s not right. Please try again.
Select to set up your Voicemail.
Your message is protected in your saved messages folder.
Your mailbox is almost full. Delete some recent messages to ensure callers are not blocked from leaving new ones.
Your mailbox is full. Delete some recent messages to ensure callers are not blocked from leaving new ones.
Your messages are protected in your saved messages folder.
Missing Voicemail number. No Voicemail number is stored on the SIM card.
Follow these steps to set up Visual Voicemail:
A free text message to 941-3567 may appear in your messaging app. You can disregard this message.
When using Reply All, recipients who have compatible cell phones can see and respond to everyone else\'s messages. You\'re all in on the same group conversation.
Would you like to record a new name greeting or use your existing one?
No connection detected. Turn internet connection on or call Voicemail for new messages.
No connection detected. Turn internet connection on or call Voicemail for new messages.
No connection detected. Turn internet connection on or call Voicemail for new messages.
There is not enough memory to download the message. Please delete previous messages.
Insufficient space to download the message. Please delete old messages.
Visual Voicemail requires the SIM to be in the device to sync with your voicemail.
You have probably changed the password in your Voicemail. You must enter a valid password to continue.
You must enter the correct password to be able to download new messages. If you do not know your password, call 611 to reset it.
Password must be at least %d digits
Password must be at least 4 digits
Your password was not changed and your previous password remains active. Please try again later.
You must create a password in Visual Voicemail or by calling Voicemail to be able to receive voicemail messages.
Password not saved, please check network and APN settings and try again
Could not play message. Please try again later or call Voicemail.
Download message failed. please try again later.
Save a local copy of newly received voicemail messages
Display message notifications in the status bar
Deactivate screen when phone is held to ear or screen is covered
Application will use SSL secure connection to communicate with the server
To use Visual Voicemail you must allow the app to access your phone, contacts and messages.
AT&T Visual Voicemail can only be accessed by this device\'s owner.
Retrieve messages error, please try again later.
The message has been exported to:
SIM card was changed. Would you like to connect to the new mailbox? (previous messages will be erased).

This is a free application without a monthly recurring fee. Data and messaging rates may apply. By clicking Accept below, you confirm that you have read and agree to the AT&T Visual Voicemail Terms of Service and the AT&T Privacy Policy

This is a free application without a monthly recurring fee. Data and messaging rates may apply. By clicking Accept below, you confirm that you have read and agree to the AT&T Visual Voicemail Terms of Service link and the AT&T Privacy Policy link
Text has been copied to clipboard.
Voicemail could not be processed to text.
Visual Voicemail update is available. Select to update from Android Market.

AT&T Visual Voicemail provides an email-like inbox that lets you easily view and listen to your voicemail messages in any order you choose. You can reply to callers by calling them back or sending a text message, all from within the application.

For added security AT&T recommends that you keep your Voicemail password turned on. To learn more go to att.com/vm
Before accessing your mailbox, please set a personal password.
You don\'t have enough space to download this message. Delete old messages to make room.
